home.headline: Tournament Registration
home.subtitle: Choose your partner and category: Men's Doubles, Women's Doubles, Mixed Doubles.

registrationStart.title: Start your registration
registrationStart.description: We'll collect your player details, level, and event selection before the waiver.

registrationLevel.title: Choose your level
registrationLevel.subtitle: Select the level you will play.
registrationLevel.missingCopy: We could not find your registration token. Start again from the beginning.

registrationEvents.title: Select events
registrationEvents.subtitle: {name}, choose the events you want to play.
registrationEvents.missingCopy: We could not find your registration token. Start again from the beginning.

registrationSummary.title: Summary
registrationSummary.missingCopy: We could not find your registration token. Start again from the beginning.

registrationWaiver.title: Waiver
registrationWaiver.missingCopy: We could not load the waiver. Please try again later.

registrationConfirmation.title: Registration complete
registrationConfirmation.inviteSuccess: You're now listed as a partner for this event.
registrationConfirmation.missingCopy: We could not find your registration token. Start again from the beginning.

manageRegistration.title: Manage registration
manageRegistration.invitePending: Your registration is not complete until your partner accepts.
manageRegistration.missingCopy: We could not find your registration token. Start again from the beginning.

invitePartner.title: Partner invite
invitePartner.invalidCopy: This invite is no longer available.
